name: .AEX File Extension
summary: Learn about .AEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An AEX file is a plug-in used by Adobe After Effects and Premiere Pro, which are professional video-editing applications. It stores content that extends the functionality of the After Effects application, such as support for camera raw files or video filters. AEX files are written in the C/C++ programming language.

content: Several plugins come installed with After Effects. However, they may also be created and sold by third-party developers. You can install a plug-in to extend the functionality of After Effects by placing it in the plug-ins folder.
AEX plugins are stored in the following directory:
Windows - Program Files\​Adobe\​Adobe After Effects (version)\​Support Files\​Plug-ins
You may have to restart After Effects in order to use a newly installed plug-in.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
